metadata.name: REGISTER_APP.VBS Proxy Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of a Microsoft signed script 'REGISTER_APP.VBS' to register a VSS/VDS Provider as a COM+ application.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\register_app.vbs')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-register')))

output.summary: Detects the use of a Microsoft signed script 'REGISTER_APP.VBS' to register a VSS/VDS Provider as a COM+ application.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate usage of the script. Always investigate what's being registered to confirm if it's benign Reference: https://twitter.com/sblmsrsn/status/1456613494783160325?s=20
